sourcesContent:
export const DATA = {
  name: 'Madasu Venkata Guruvulu',
  shortName: 'MVG',
  title: 'Drug Safety ¬∑ ICSR Processing  ',
  tagline: 'Pharmacovigilance Professional',
  email: 'madasuguru87@gmail.com',
  phone: '+91 9347852207',
  phoneHref: 'tel:+919347852207',
  linkedin: 'http://www.linkedin.com/in/venkatamadasu',
  location: 'Hyderabad, India',
  objective:
    'Pharmacovigilance fresher with hands-on experience in bioanalytical research and exposure to adverse event identification, ICSR processing (basics), and MedDRA coding. Skilled in safety documentation, GCP compliance, and Argus Safety basics. Seeking an entry-level role in Drug Safety/Pharmacovigilance.',

  stats: [
    { num: '3+', label: 'Years Experience' },
    { num: '2',  label: 'Publications' },
    { num: '1',  label: 'Patent' },
    { num: '4+', label: 'Certifications' },
  ],

  about: [
    { icon: 'üéì', label: 'Education',    value: 'M.Pharm ‚Äì Quality Assurance' },
    { icon: 'üìç', label: 'Location',     value: 'Hyderabad, India' },
    { icon: 'üíº', label: 'Current Role', value: 'Research Associate' },
    { icon: 'üéØ', label: 'Target Role',  value: 'PV / Drug Safety Associate' },
    { icon: 'üî¨', label: 'Experience',   value: '2+ Years Research' },
    { icon: 'üìú', label: 'Training',     value: 'Clinical Research Diploma' },
  ],

  skills: [
    {
      category: 'Pharmacovigilance Core',
      items: [
        { name: 'ICSR Processing', core: true },
        { name: 'Case Triage', core: true },
        { name: 'MedDRA Coding', core: true },
        { name: 'SAE & SUSAR', core: true },
        { name: 'Adverse Event ID', core: false },
        { name: 'Safety Narrative Writing', core: false },
        { name: 'Seriousness Assessment', core: false },
      ],
    },
    {
      category: 'Tools & Software',
      items: [
        { name: 'Argus Safety', core: true },
        { name: 'Discovery Studio', core: false },
        { name: 'Pyrx', core: false },
        { name: '2D & 3D ChemDraw', core: false },
        { name: 'MS Word / Excel', core: false },
        { name: 'PowerPoint', core: false },
      ],
    },
    {
      category: 'Regulatory & Compliance',
      items: [
        { name: 'GCP Guidelines', core: false },
        { name: 'QA Documentation', core: false },
        { name: 'SOP Preparation', core: false },
        { name: 'Study Protocols', core: false },
        { name: 'Regulatory Standards', core: false },
        { name: 'PV Guidelines', core: false },
      ],
    },
    {
      category: 'Research Skills',
      items: [
        { name: 'Bioanalytical Research', core: false },
        { name: 'Clinical Data Analysis', core: false },
        { name: 'In Silico Studies', core: false },
        { name: 'In Vitro Evaluation', core: false },
        { name: 'RP-HPLC', core: false },
        { name: 'Scientific Writing', core: false },
      ],
    },
  ],

  experience: [
    {
      company: 'Leiutis Pharmaceuticals LLP',
      role: 'Research Associate ‚Äì Bioanalytical (Pharmacovigilance Exposure)',
      period: 'Feb 2023 ‚Äì Present',
      location: 'Hyderabad, Telangana',
      achievements: [
        'Performed bioanalytical sample preparation and data interpretation for clinical and preclinical studies in compliance with GCP and QA guidelines',
        'Prepared and reviewed SOPs, STPs, and study protocols as per regulatory standards',
        'Identified adverse events (AEs) from clinical and bioanalytical data',
        'Supported preparation and review of drug safety documentation in compliance with pharmacovigilance guidelines',
        'Evaluated temporal relationship between drug exposure and adverse events',
      ],
    },
  ],

  education: [
    { degree: 'M.Pharm in Quality Assurance', school: 'Vagdevi College of Pharmacy, Gurzala', year: '2023 ‚Äì 2025', cgpa: '7.2' },
    { degree: 'B.Pharmacy', school: "Vignan's Foundation for Science, Technology & Research ‚Äì Guntur", year: '2019 ‚Äì 2023', cgpa: '7.92' },
    { degree: 'Intermediate (MPC)', school: 'Sri Chaitanya Junior College, Guntur', year: '2017 ‚Äì 2019', cgpa: '9.34' },
  ],

  projects: [
    {
      type: 'M.Pharm Project',
      title: 'Natural Heterocycle Compound as Potential Anticancer Agent: In Silico and In Vitro Evaluation',
      desc: 'Computational and laboratory-based evaluation of natural compounds for anticancer potential using molecular docking and cell-based assays.',
    },
    {
      type: 'B.Pharm Project',
      title: 'Simultaneous Estimation of Selective Serotonin Receptor Agonists by RP-HPLC',
      desc: 'Method development and validation for simultaneous estimation in bulk and pharmaceutical dosage forms using reverse-phase HPLC.',
    },
  ],

  publications: [
    { type: 'r', badge: 'Research Article', title: 'Gabapentin Novel Co-Crystals: An Attempt to Enhance Physicochemical Parameters' },
    { type: 'p', badge: 'Patent', title: 'Targeted Anticancer Agent From Natural Heterocyclic Compounds: A Comprehensive In Silico and In Vitro Approach' },
    { type: 'c', badge: 'Certification', title: 'One-Year Training Program at CAVAXION CLINICAL RESEARCH ‚Äì Diploma in Clinical Research (Pharmacovigilance, Clinical Research, Clinical Data Management)' },
    { type: 'c', badge: 'Conference', title: 'National Conference VIGILANZA-2022 on Pharmacovigilance, Haemovigilance & Materiovigilance ‚Äì Vignan Pharmacy College, Guntur' },
  ],

  strengths: [
    { icon: 'üß†', text: 'Strong knowledge of clinical research and pharmacovigilance workflows' },
    { icon: '‚úçÔ∏è', text: 'Research aptitude with scientific writing and documentation skills' },
    { icon: 'ü§ù', text: 'Confident communicator with ability to work in team-based regulatory environments' },
  ],

  activities: [
    'Selected in Science Academics Summer Research Fellowship Program ‚Äì 2022',
    'National Level Webinar on Systematic Approach towards Computer-Aided Drug Discovery by Worldwide Online Educational Academy',
  ],

  languages: [
    { name: 'English', level: 'Professional' },
    { name: 'Hindi',   level: 'Fluent' },
    { name: 'Telugu',  level: 'Native' },
  ],
};
